mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_STUDYING VALUES ( SEQ_SNO.NEXTVAL, #{refRno}, #{studyingUser}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT STUDYING_NO studyingNo, REF_RNO refRno, M.NICKNAME studyingUser, CREATE_DATE createDate FROM TB_STUDYING JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON(STUDYING_USER = USER_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_RNO = #{refRno} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_STUDYING SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
